ROW.PDT: *IF ( ( *VALUE KLZ_Disk.Mount_Point *NE '/cdrom' *AND *VALUE KLZ_Disk.Disk_Used_Percent *GE 85 *AND *VALUE KLZ_Disk.Mount_Point *NE '/oracle/CEP' *AND *VALUE KLZ_Disk.Mount_Point *NE '/boot' ) *OR ( *VALUE KLZ_Disk.Mount_Point *EQ '/boot' *AND *VALUE KLZ_Disk.Disk_Used_Percent *GE 95 ) *OR ( *VALUE KLZ_Disk.Mount_Point *EQ '/oracle/CEP' *AND *VALUE KLZ_Disk.Disk_Used_Percent *GE 95 ) )
ROW.TEXT: 磁盘百分比>=85%且安装点!=cdrom和/oracle/CEP;7*24;1
